trans-unit.source: Represents errors that occur when validating properties of a dynamic data source.
trans-unit.target: 表示验证动态数据源的属性时发生的错误。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException" /> class with a system-supplied message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用系统提供用以描述错误的消息创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: This constructor initializes the <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> property of the new instance to a system-supplied message that describes the error, such as "DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply".
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数将新实例的 <xref:System.Exception.Message%2A> 属性初始化为系统提供的消息，该消息描述诸如“DefaultMessageDisplayedByParameterlessCtorWriterMustSupply”的错误。

trans-unit.source: This message takes into account the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此消息将当前系统区域性考虑在内。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.InsufficientMemoryException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The localized error message string.
trans-unit.target: 本地化的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述该异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException" /> class with a specified message that describes the error.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的错误描述消息创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: The message that describes the exception.
trans-unit.target: 描述该异常的消息。

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: 此构造函数的调用方需要确保此字符串已针对当前系统区域性进行了本地化。

trans-unit.source: The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: 导致当前异常的异常。

trans-unit.source: If the <c>innerException</c> parameter is not <see langword="null" />, the current exception is raised in a <see langword="catch" /> block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <c>innerException</c> 参数不为 <see langword="null" />，则当前异常会在处理内部异常的 <see langword="catch" /> 块中引发。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException" /> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定错误消息和对作为此异常原因的内部异常的引用来创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: An exception that is thrown as a direct result of a previous exception should include a reference to the previous exception in the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 因前一个异常而直接引发的异常应在 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性中包含对前一个异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property returns the same value that is passed into the constructor, or `null` if the <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> property does not supply the inner exception value to the constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A> 属性返回的值与传递到构造函数中的值相同；或者，如果 `null` 属性没有向构造函数提供内部异常值，则为 <xref:System.Exception.InnerException%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException>.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException> 的实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Value
`null`.
trans-unit.target: `null`。

trans-unit.source: The error message string specified in `message`.
trans-unit.target: `message` 中指定的错误消息字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the exceptions that occur when a new or edited data field is validated.
trans-unit.target: 获取在对新数据字段或编辑的数据字段进行验证时发生的异常。

trans-unit.source: A collection that contains all the exceptions that occurred.
trans-unit.target: 一个集合，其中包含发生的所有异常。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicValidatorException> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EntityDataSourceValidationException> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Web.DynamicData.IDynamicValidatorException> 接口时使用。
